patthana23.44:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.44:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.44:3.1_1: avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe
